name: Permits for coral and rock with marine life attached
text: §188-68  Permits for coral and rock with marine life attached.  The department may issue permits, as authorized by this section, section 187A-6, chapter 183C, or under rules adopted pursuant to chapter 91 necessary for collecting live stony corals or marine life visibly attached to rocks placed in the water for a commercial purpose. [L 1988, c 374, §1; am L 1990, c 69, §2; am L 1991, c 184, §4; am L 1993, c 256, §3; am L 1995, c 11, §7 and c 69, §5; am L 1999, c 85, §§4, 17; am L 2002, c 151, §1]
